contextId.information: Moses continues to remind the Israelites of what they know about Yahweh ([[:en:bible:notes:deu:08:13|8:14]]). (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_distinguish]])
contextId.quote: who led you ... in the end

contextId.information: The phrase "which Yahweh your God hates" is giving more information about the sacred stone pillar. AT: "any sacred stone pillar because Yahweh your God hates them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_distinguish]])
contextId.quote: any sacred stone pillar, which Yahweh your God hates
